generalization of the standard LSTM arch.from sentence: In this paper , we introduce a generalization of the standard LSTM architecture to tree - structured network topologies and show its superiority for representing sentence meaning over a sequential LSTM .

tree - structured LSTM , or Tree - LSTM.from sentence: While the standard LSTM composes its hidden state from the input at the current time step and the hidden state of the LSTM unit in the previous time step , the tree - structured LSTM , or Tree - LSTM , composes its state from an input vector and the hidden states of arbitrarily many child units .
